name: Space Bits
description:
The first game I ever did by myself, Space Bits is a highly stylized arcade shoot-em up with custom sounds and sprites, reminiscent of 8-bit games like Gallaga. 

The game itself was finished in early 2015, over the course of 2 weeks using Game Maker Studio.

Instructions:

Destroy as many enemies as possible until you run out of lives.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Basic Movement

Spacebar - Shoot
